title: Cold weapon
text:
A cold weapon (or white arm) is a <a href="weapon">weapon</a> that does not involve fire or explosions (such as the act of <a href="combustion">combustion</a>) as a result from the use of <a href="gunpowder">gunpowder</a> or other <a href="explosive%20material">explosive material</a>s. 
<a href="Ranged%20weapon">Ranged weapon</a>s that do not require gunpowder or explosive materials and <a href="melee%20weapon">melee weapon</a>s are cold weapons, including: <a href="knife">knives</a>, <a href="dagger">dagger</a>s, <a href="sword">sword</a>s, <a href="bayonet">bayonet</a>s, <a href="club%20%28weapon%29">club</a>s, <a href="axe">axe</a>s, <a href="spear">spear</a>s, <a href="sling%20%28weapon%29">sling</a>s, <a href="bow%20%28weapon%29">bow</a>s, and <a href="crossbow">crossbow</a>s. <a href="Firearms">Firearms</a>, <a href="explosive">explosive</a>s (such as <a href="grenade">grenade</a>s, <a href="land%20mine">mine</a>s, <a href="bomb">bomb</a>s, <a href="rocket%20%28weapon%29">rocket</a>s, and <a href="missile">missile</a>s), and <a href="Early%20thermal%20weapons">similar weapons</a> which rely on heat or burning are not classified as cold weapons.
